price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߛߊ߲߫ ߥߐߙߐ߲ߥߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߊ߲߫ ߢߊ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߡߊ߬ ( ߓߟߌߕߍ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ )  ߢߊ ߡߍ߲؟
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
